com.inchok.aria2

Interface DownloadCallback


  • public interface DownloadCallback
    The download event listener of Aria2. To set the download event listener, use SessionConfig.setDownloadEvent(DownloadCallback).
    Version:
    Version 1.0
    Author:
    inCHOK
    See Also:
    SessionConfig.SessionConfig(boolean, boolean, DownloadCallback), SessionConfig.setDownloadCallback(DownloadCallback)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int onDownloadEvent(Session session, DownloadEvent event, Gid gid)
      This callback method is invoked when a download event occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • onDownloadEvent

        int onDownloadEvent(Session session,
                    DownloadEvent event,
                    Gid gid)
        This callback method is invoked when a download event occurs. Implement this method to handle the download event.
        Parameters:
        session - The Aria2 session where the download event occurs.
        event - The kind of download event.
        gid - The gid refers to the download which this event is fired on.
        Returns:
        The return value is ignored by now, but to keep compatibility, the implement of this method should return Aria2.RESPONSE_OK if succeed.
        See Also:
        Session, DownloadEvent, Gid, Aria2.RESPONSE_OK
